english.segment1: I don't know how I got to where I am. All I know is that I want to go back. to the moment when I fell in lovve with grace. and I hear You whisper
english.segment2: Hang on, I know your hope seems gone. Hang on, sometimes the heartache makes you strong. Remember the first time love turned you around
english.segment3: I try my best to pray but my heart won't move. And all the words the saints say, they just don't help. I want to go back to when I first called out Your name. and I hear You whisper
english.segment4: To the moment when I fell in love with grace. To the day when I first called out Jesus' name
